course_details: Learn the fundamentals of the C programming language, including data types, control structures, functions, and memory management.
This course provides a comprehensive introduction to algorithms, covering a wide range of fundamental algorithms and data structures.
In this course you will learn key C++ concepts, data structures, and algorithms commonly used in computer science and competitive programming.
In this course,you will learn about arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and basic tree structures.
This course is designed how to create and use classes and objects, encapsulate data, and implement inheritance and polymorphism.
This comprehensive course covers the principles, practices, and methodologies of software engineering.
In this course you will learn how to set up and manage cloud infrastructure, deploy applications, and leverage AWS services such as EC2, S3, RDS, and more.
This course offers how to design and create relational databases, perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations, write SQL queries, and optimize database performance.
This course is dedicated to enhancing your problem-solving skills in various domains.
